title: Google outs Android 5.0 Lollipop source code | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Of course, the size of the source files is assuredly huge, so it’ll be quite awhile before everything of note will be unearthed.Google finally launched its Android 5.0 Lollipop OS last month, with thesoftware due to [rollout](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-5-0-lollipop-update)across most recently-released smartphones over the next few months.New features include 64-bit chip support, improved cross-platformfunctionality, boosted battery life, and an aesthetic overhaul dubbed‘material design.’**Read More:**[Samsung Galaxy S6 releasedate](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price)**Via:** [Android Police](http://www.androidpolice.com/2014/11/03/google-pushing-android-5-0-lollipop-source-code-aosp-right-now/)
